mapper.select: SELECT c.company_name, td.dname, emp.emp_no, eM.emp_rank, eM.hiredate, eM.retireddate, c.company_tel, c.company_address FROM emp LEFT JOIN empMapping eM on emp.emp_no = eM.emp_no LEFT JOIN orga o on o.orga_no = eM.orga_no LEFT JOIN deptMapping dM on o.upper_orga_no = dM.orga_no LEFT JOIN tbl_dept td on td.dept_no = dM.dept_no LEFT JOIN company c on td.company_no = c.company_no WHERE emp.emp_no = #{empNo};
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO emp ( emp_name, username, password, gender, emp_phone, emp_address, emp_profile, email, last_login_time, last_login_ip , first_hiredate, last_retiredate ) VALUES ( #{empName}, #{username}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{empPhone}, #{empAddress}, #{empProfile}, #{email}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{lastLoginIp}, #{firstHiredate} , #{lastRetiredate} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

INSERT INTO orga ( upper_orga_no, orga_type ) VALUES ( ( SELECT deptMapping.orga_no FROM deptMapping JOIN tbl_dept td ON td.dept_no = deptMapping.dept_no WHERE td.dept_no = #{deptNo} ), #{orgaType})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
